abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress, perhaps because it was already automatically detected.
abort.cannot_connect: Connection failed. Please check the device is online
abort.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
abort.missing_unique_id: Device does not have a unique identifier
abort.no_discovery: No Home Assistant discovery topics found within 30 seconds
abort.no_discovery_support: Device does not support Home Assistant discovery

error.cannot_connect: Connection failed. Please check the device is online and accessible.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

data_description.password: Password required for secure MQTT connection

password.description: Unsecure MQTT connection failed. Please enter the secure profile password for device {host}.
password.title: Secure profile password

ssdp_confirm.description: Do you want to add {name} @ {host} to Home Assistant?
ssdp_confirm.title: Add Victron Energy device

data_description.password: Password for secure MQTT connection to the device

ssdp_password.description: Unsecure MQTT connection for {name} @ {host}. Please enter the secure profile password.
ssdp_password.title: Secure profile password

data_description.broker: IP address or hostname of your Victron Energy device

user.description: Enter the IP address or hostname of your Victron Energy device.
user.title: Connect to Victron Energy device

publish.name: Publish MQTT message
publish.description: Publish a message to the MQTT broker associated with a Victron Energy config entry.

config_entry.name: Config entry
config_entry.description: Configuration entry (hub) to select which broker to publish to.

topic.name: Topic
topic.description: MQTT topic to publish to. The integration will automatically prefix the topic with 'W/..vrm_id../'.

payload.name: Payload
payload.description: Payload to publish. If a non-string is supplied it will be JSON-encoded.

advanced_fields.description: Advanced options that are rarely needed
advanced_fields.name: Advanced options
